name: ProTech
description:
This game is for The ScoreSpace Jam #17

(the game may have some bugs)

You are a PROfessional TECHnician that wants to PROTECT the Power Source from ROBOTS. You only have a STRONG NAIL GUN to destroy the robots. Do you have what it takes? 

How To Play

• Press WASD to Move.

• Press Space Or Click to Shoot.

• Collect nails scattered around the ground.

• Protect the Power Source by not letting the robots get near it.

• Every 3 kills, a shield will appear around the Power Source

• You will lose if all 5 lives are gone

• Get a high score by collecting nails and destroying robots.

• Every time you defeat a robot, it will explode killing other robots around it.

Bug Fixes

Feb. 1, 2022 - Fixed nail not shooting when pressing restart

This game was made in 3 days.

This is the first game I've posted to itch.
